Suggested_Paper_Gist: Rousseau's social contract theory - legitimacy derives from general will and popular sovereignty
Full_Citation: Rousseau, Jean-Jacques. 1762/1997. The Social Contract and Other Later Political Writings. Edited by Victor Gourevitch. Cambridge: Cambridge University Press.

Suggested_Paper_Gist: Algorithmic legitimacy requires procedural fairness, transparency, and accountability in automated decision-making

Suggested_Paper_Gist: Development should measure capabilities (freedoms to achieve valued functionings) not just utility
